[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/teamsfx](./teamsfx.md) &gt; [AuthenticationConfiguration](./teamsfx.authenticationconfiguration.md)

## AuthenticationConfiguration interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Authentication related configuration.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AuthenticationConfiguration 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [applicationIdUri](./teamsfx.authenticationconfiguration.applicationiduri.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Application ID URI. Default value comes from M365\_APPLICATION\_ID\_URI environment variable. |
|  [authorityHost](./teamsfx.authenticationconfiguration.authorityhost.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Hostname of AAD authority. Default value comes from M365\_AUTHORITY\_HOST environment variable. |
|  [clientId](./teamsfx.authenticationconfiguration.clientid.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The client (application) ID of an App Registration in the tenant, default value comes from M365\_CLIENT\_ID environment variable |
|  [clientSecret](./teamsfx.authenticationconfiguration.clientsecret.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Secret string that the application uses when requesting a token. Only used in confidential client applications. Can be created in the Azure app registration portal. Default value comes from M365\_CLIENT\_SECRET environment variable |
|  [initiateLoginEndpoint](./teamsfx.authenticationconfiguration.initiateloginendpoint.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Login page for Teams to redirect to. Default value comes from INITIATE\_LOGIN\_ENDPOINT environment variable. |
|  [simpleAuthEndpoint](./teamsfx.authenticationconfiguration.simpleauthendpoint.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Endpoint of auth service provisioned by Teams Framework. Default value comes from SIMPLE\_AUTH\_ENDPOINT environment variable. |
|  [tenantId](./teamsfx.authenticationconfiguration.tenantid.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> AAD tenant id, default value comes from M365\_TENANT\_ID environment variable. |
